variables.input:
fetch dt.entity.process_group_instance
| fieldsAdd pgi_name=entity.name
| filter contains(pgi_name,"crowdstrike",caseSensitive:false)
| lookup 
	[
		fetch dt.entity.process_group_instance
		| fieldsAdd host_id=belongs_to[dt.entity.host]
        | fieldsAdd runs
        | fieldsAdd metadata
        | fieldsAdd isDockerized
        | fieldsAdd awsNameTag
        | fieldsAdd pgi_id = id
        | fieldsAdd inbound_pgi=toString(called_by)
        | fieldsAdd outbound_pgi=toString(calls)
        | fieldsAdd pgi_name = entity.name
	], sourceField:pgi_name, lookupField:pgi_name, prefix:"process."

| lookup [
        fetch dt.entity.host
        | fieldsAdd host_name = entity.name
        | fieldsAdd monitoringMode
        | fieldsAdd osType
], sourceField:process.host_id, lookupField:id, prefix:"host."
  | fieldsAdd uptime=toLong(toTimestamp(host.lifetime[end])-toTimestamp(host.lifetime[start]))
  | filter host.osType=="WINDOWS"
  // Determine whether the server has been restarted in the last 24 hrs
  | fieldsAdd recent_restart=if(uptime<24*60*60*1000000000,"YES",else:"NO")
  | limit 10000
  | filter host.osType=="WINDOWS"
  | fieldsAdd tenantId=$TenantID
  | fieldsAdd host_link = concat("https://",tenantId,".apps.dynatrace.com/ui/apps/dynatrace.classic.hosts/ui/entity/",host.id)
  | fields `Host`=host.host_name, `Process Name`=pgi_name, `Host Link`=host_link, `Recently Restarted?`=recent_restart
  | summarize count=count(), by:{`Recently Restarted?`}
  | sort `Recently Restarted?` desc
  | fields `Recently Restarted?`

0.title: CrowdStrike Impacted Host Details
0.query:
fetch dt.entity.process_group_instance
| fieldsAdd pgi_name=entity.name
| filter contains(pgi_name,"crowdstrike",caseSensitive:false)
| lookup 
	[
		fetch dt.entity.process_group_instance
		| fieldsAdd host_id=belongs_to[dt.entity.host]
        | fieldsAdd runs
        | fieldsAdd metadata
        | fieldsAdd isDockerized
        | fieldsAdd awsNameTag
        | fieldsAdd pgi_id = id
        | fieldsAdd inbound_pgi=toString(called_by)
        | fieldsAdd outbound_pgi=toString(calls)
        | fieldsAdd pgi_name = entity.name
	], sourceField:pgi_name, lookupField:pgi_name, prefix:"process."

| lookup [
        fetch dt.entity.host
        | fieldsAdd host_name = entity.name
        | fieldsAdd monitoringMode
        | fieldsAdd osType
], sourceField:process.host_id, lookupField:id, prefix:"host."
  | fieldsAdd uptime=toLong(toTimestamp(host.lifetime[end])-toTimestamp(host.lifetime[start]))
  | filter host.osType=="WINDOWS"
  
  // Determine whether the server has been restarted in the last 24 hrs
  | fieldsAdd recent_restart=if(uptime<24*60*60*1000000000,"YES",else:"NO")
  | limit 10000
  | filter host.osType=="WINDOWS"
  
  // Apply filters
  | fieldsAdd tenantId=$TenantID
  | fieldsAdd host_filter=if($HostFilter=="ALL","",else:$HostFilter)
  | filter contains(host.host_name,host_filter,caseSensitive:false)
  | filter in(recent_restart,$RecentRestart)
  | fieldsAdd host_link = concat("https://",tenantId,".apps.dynatrace.com/ui/apps/dynatrace.classic.hosts/ui/entity/",host.id)
  | fields `Host`=host.host_name, `Process Name`=pgi_name, `Host Link`=host_link, `Recently Restarted?`=recent_restart
  | summarize count=count(), by:{`Host`, `Host Link`, `Recently Restarted?`}
  | sort `Recently Restarted?` asc
  | fields `Host`, `Recently Restarted?`,  `Host Link`

1.content:
All servers selected here are running _Windows_ and have CrowdStrike processes running/recently active within the time shown in the time selector (upper lefthand side).
* Use `HostFilter` to search for hosts by their names. This field is a wildcard.
* Use `RecentRestart` to select servers that have been restarted in the past 24 hrs. This can help prioritize remediation.
* Right-click on `Host Link` and select `Open Link` to drill into more details about the host in question.

3.query:
fetch dt.entity.process_group_instance
| fieldsAdd pgi_name=entity.name
| filter contains(pgi_name,"crowdstrike",caseSensitive:false)
| lookup 
	[
		fetch dt.entity.process_group_instance
		| fieldsAdd host_id=belongs_to[dt.entity.host]
        | fieldsAdd runs
        | fieldsAdd metadata
        | fieldsAdd isDockerized
        | fieldsAdd awsNameTag
        | fieldsAdd pgi_id = id
        | fieldsAdd inbound_pgi=toString(called_by)
        | fieldsAdd outbound_pgi=toString(calls)
        | fieldsAdd pgi_name = entity.name
	], sourceField:pgi_name, lookupField:pgi_name, prefix:"process."

| lookup [
        fetch dt.entity.host
        | fieldsAdd host_name = entity.name
        | fieldsAdd monitoringMode
        | fieldsAdd osType
], sourceField:process.host_id, lookupField:id, prefix:"host."
  | fieldsAdd uptime=toLong(toTimestamp(host.lifetime[end])-toTimestamp(host.lifetime[start]))
  | filter host.osType=="WINDOWS"
  
  // Determine whether the server has been restarted in the last 24 hrs
  | fieldsAdd recent_restart=if(uptime<24*60*60*1000000000,"YES",else:"NO")
  | limit 10000
  | filter host.osType=="WINDOWS"
  
  // Apply filters
  | fieldsAdd tenantId=$TenantID
  | fieldsAdd host_filter=if($HostFilter=="ALL","",else:$HostFilter)
  | filter contains(host.host_name,host_filter,caseSensitive:false)
  | filter in(recent_restart,$RecentRestart)
  | fieldsAdd host_link = concat("https://",tenantId,".apps.dynatrace.com/ui/apps/dynatrace.classic.hosts/ui/entity/",host.id)
  | fields `Host`=host.host_name, `Process Name`=pgi_name, `Host Link`=host_link, `Recently Restarted?`=recent_restart
  | summarize `Host Count`=countDistinct(`Host`)

4.query:
fetch dt.entity.process_group_instance
| fieldsAdd pgi_name=entity.name
| filter contains(pgi_name,"crowdstrike",caseSensitive:false)
| lookup 
	[
		fetch dt.entity.process_group_instance
		| fieldsAdd host_id=belongs_to[dt.entity.host]
        | fieldsAdd runs
        | fieldsAdd metadata
        | fieldsAdd isDockerized
        | fieldsAdd awsNameTag
        | fieldsAdd pgi_id = id
        | fieldsAdd inbound_pgi=toString(called_by)
        | fieldsAdd outbound_pgi=toString(calls)
        | fieldsAdd pgi_name = entity.name
	], sourceField:pgi_name, lookupField:pgi_name, prefix:"process."

| lookup [
        fetch dt.entity.host
        | fieldsAdd host_name = entity.name
        | fieldsAdd monitoringMode
        | fieldsAdd osType
], sourceField:process.host_id, lookupField:id, prefix:"host."
  | fieldsAdd uptime=toLong(toTimestamp(host.lifetime[end])-toTimestamp(host.lifetime[start]))
  | filter host.osType=="WINDOWS"
  
  // Determine whether the server has been restarted in the last 24 hrs
  | fieldsAdd recent_restart=if(uptime<24*60*60*1000000000,"YES",else:"NO")
  | limit 10000
  | filter host.osType=="WINDOWS"
  
  // Apply filters
  | fieldsAdd tenantId=$TenantID
  | fieldsAdd host_filter=if($HostFilter=="ALL","",else:$HostFilter)
  | filter contains(host.host_name,host_filter,caseSensitive:false)
  | filter in(recent_restart,$RecentRestart)
  | fieldsAdd host_link = concat("https://",tenantId,".apps.dynatrace.com/ui/apps/dynatrace.classic.hosts/ui/entity/",host.id)
  | fields `Host`=host.host_name, `Process Name`=pgi_name, `Host Link`=host_link, `Recently Restarted?`=recent_restart
  | filter `Recently Restarted?` == "YES"
  | summarize `Recently Restarted Server Count`=countDistinct(`Host`)
